attributes.action: Ban animal testing and to stop cruelty for all farm animals:from and at the farm through to the slaughter house to their death, including dairy faming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a vegetarian and vegan i strongly oppose animal testing and the unnecessary cruelty from the process from the farm to the death of the animal, whether it be from being slaughtered for meat or from death in an unnecessary way on a cramped dairy. farm
